screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Picture-in-picture settings for the Google Play Movies & TV app. The app is currently set to allow Picture-in-Picture, which allows the app to continue playing videos in a small window while other apps are open.
action_result: By clicking on the back button, I have returned to the main Picture-in-Picture settings page. This is necessary because it allows us to switch to the settings for the specific application, which is the Google Play Movies & TV app in this case. As you requested to turn off picture-in-picture for this app, I will now proceed to toggle the switch next to "Google Play Movies & TV" to allow or disallow this feature. This alignment with your user request is crucial for managing app permissions effectively.
